game:blockdesc-torch-crude-lit-up: A crudely made torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-crude-unlit-up: A freshly (and crudely) made torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-extinguished-unlit-: A crudely made, extinguished torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-crude-burnedout-up: A crudely made, burned out torch that will no longer light. The tip can be recycled for charcoal.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-lit-up: A simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-unlit-up: A freshly made, simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-extinguished-: A simple, extinguished torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-burnedout-up: A simple, burned out torch that will no longer light. The tip can be recycled for charcoal.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-lit-up: A long-lasting torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-unlit-up: A freshly made, long-lasting torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-lit-up: A long-lasting, extinguished torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-burnedout-up: A long-lasting, burned out torch that will no longer light. The tip can be recycled for charcoal.
